PHIL-3454
A Temporal Order to the Universe Independent of Man?

div.p: The problem of evil arises out of the fact that there is a suffiicient amount of evil in this world. Further, the fact that God is often construed as being omnipotent, omni-benevolant, and omni - it would seem illogical that this evil exists in this world.
